directions: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat until melted. Add shrimp and toss to coat. Add garlic, red pepper flakes, lemon zest, lemon juice, and parsley. Cook until pink and no longer translucent, 5 to 7 minutes.
Mound linguine in large bowl. Spoon shrimp mixture over and toss to combine. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 pound large uncooked shrimp, peeled, deveined, and butterflied
zest and juice of 1/2 a lemon
Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: Linguine with Scampi
